channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: FAA lifts order slashing flights, allowing commercial airlines to resume their regular schedules
item.description: Summary: The Federal Aviation Administration says it is lifting all restrictions on commercial flights that were imposed during the government shutdown at 40 major U.S. airports.

item.title: Dozens arrested in North Carolina immigration enforcement surge, Border Patrol official says
Immigrant student enrollment is dwindling at schools across the US
